Two university students have been charged with drug trafficking after being arrested over the weekend PERIOD

Crimestoppers offered a tip to the Drug Task Force that led to the arrests of Caleb Woodlief and Cody Witherspoon PERIOD

According to WITN the Greenville IMPACT team caught and charged the two students with possession and trafficking PERIOD

A warrant was served on Saturday at an apartment at  Bostic Drive where police found a pound of marijuana ecstasy and LSD PERIOD

Twentyyearold Cody Weatherspoon was jailed under a  bond PERIOD

On Sunday a home on Brownlea Drive was searched and 19yearold Caleb Woodlief was arrested after police seized marijuana ecstasy and  in cash PERIOD

Woodlief was placed under  secured bond PERIOD

According to ECU Weatherspoon enrolled in August  and Woodlief enrolled in August  PERIOD
